main event: Witnesses observed a red light in the sky moving in an erratic manner in Omaha, Nebraska on 7 September 1953.
interesting points: The object was reported to be red and visible from all angles., It exhibited a size of approximately half a pea and moved at an erratic course., Witnesses included a sales engineer, a housewife, and a military pilot., The sighting lasted about 5 minutes and the object disappeared at high speed., No radar or visual evidence was found to support the sighting.
sighted object: a red light in the sky
witness description: Sales engineer, housewife, ex-military fighter pilot
